Customize your own Radio station This app be a nifty program! I be look for a all in one app something like iTunes but they do not make iTunes for my device and this one come close to the mark. You can listen three way: Upload all your own music Purchase music from Pandora Listen to unlimited free music in the form of radio station The feature I like the much be the Radio Station maker. You can make custom list of song that Pandora will play in sequence and it do NOT have to be music you already own or have to buy. For example if you like a specific genre of music you can choose that search feature Pandora will go out and grab music that fall into the category and make you a radio station of it. If it bring in a song you dislike you click on skip button and it will be discard from your station. You can also rate song so the app will learn what interest you. You can make other radio station and keep the many different station you make in a library by use your own music or by combine yours with Pandora's. You can make radio station of a single band specific genre's or many other different way. it be a great app to find music you be think about purchase and listen to all of it first or to find music you haven't hear yet from a band you love and even find other band you have never hear before base on music you like. The app come in a free ad base version the ad's be NOT annoy and relentless or you can get a pay app. The one I use be the free one and you barely notice the ad's and infrequent short commercial. Great music listen software!
